chat.title: remove silver sulfadiazine
chat.message:
please remove the silver sulfadiazine, it is OLD and no longer recommended by burn centers. 


add dressings (ex. bactigras, jelonet, adaptic)

chat.title: analgesia, CN/CO
chat.message:
add NSAIDS (toradol, ibuprofen), opioids ( IV/IN fentanyl/morphine/dilaudid), +/- ketamine (analgesic dosing not for intubation)


consideration of cyanide/carbon monoxide in major burns: 
- add VBG, co-oximetry for CO/CN
- add cyanokit

chat.title: IV fluids
chat.message:
use modified brook/parkland formula (2-4cc x %BSA x weight in kg, where 1/2 given over 8 hours then 1/2 next 16 hrs). with indications for fluid resus (ex. adults >20%)


not sure if this would go in a separate burns admission order set.
